description: Number of filter bases of an n-set.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 91, #42.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..12
prog: (PARI) { for (n = 1, 12, a=0; for (k=0, n-1, a+=binomial(n, k)*2^(2^k - 1); ); write("b059301.txt", n, " ", a); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 25 2009(PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n-1, binomial(n,k)*2^(2^k-1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 03 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 26 2001
